languages.text: {n}Половину его лица скрывает золотая маска с застывшим на ней грозным ликом. Вторая половина осклабилась в злорадной острозубой улыбке. Изысканные доспехи ксеноса украшают черепа и лоскуты человеческой кожи, нанизанные на лезвия и крюки. Он держится властно и непринужденно, словно правитель крепко сжимающий в тисках своих пальцев нити судьбы всех присутствующих в помещении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Половину его лица скрывает золотая маска с застывшим на ней грозным ликом. Вторая половина осклабилась в злорадной острозубой улыбке. Изысканные доспехи ксеноса украшают черепа и лоскуты человеческой кожи, нанизанные на лезвия и крюки. Он держится властно и непринужденно, словно правитель крепко сжимающий в тисках своих пальцев нити судьбы всех присутствующих в помещении.{/n}

languages.text: {n}One half of his face is hidden behind a golden mask with an intimidating visage, the other half is showing a malicious, sharp-toothed leer. The xenos's elaborate armour is decorated with skulls and patches of human skin impaled on countless blades and hooks. He carries himself with authority and ease, as though he is a ruler who holds the threads of fate of all those present tightly in his grasp.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Половину его лица скрывает золотая маска с застывшим на ней грозным ликом. Вторая половина осклабилась в злорадной острозубой улыбке. Изысканные доспехи ксеноса украшают черепа и лоскуты человеческой кожи, нанизанные на лезвия и крюки. Он держится властно и непринужденно, словно правитель крепко сжимающий в тисках своих пальцев нити судьбы всех присутствующих в помещении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One half of his face is hidden behind a golden mask with an intimidating visage, the other half is showing a malicious, sharp-toothed leer. The xenos's elaborate armour is decorated with skulls and patches of human skin, impaled on countless blades and hooks. He carries himself with authority and ease, as if he were a ruler clutching the threads of fate of all those present tightly in his fingers.{/n}

He carries himself with authority and ease, as though he is a ruler who holds the threads of fate of all those present tightly in his grasp.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位黑暗灵族半张脸隐藏在金色的面具后面，面具上的面孔令人望而生畏，另外半张脸则露出了充满恶意的微笑，露着尖牙。精心制作的盔甲上，装饰着无数头骨，以及被利刃与钩子刺穿的人皮碎片。他的举止充满了权威与轻松，仿佛他是这里的统治者，而在场所有人的命运之线都紧紧握在他的手中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One half of his face is hidden behind a golden mask with an intimidating visage, the other half is showing a malicious, sharp-toothed leer. The xenos's elaborate armour is decorated with skulls and patches of human skin impaled on countless blades and hooks. He carries himself with authority and ease, as though he is a ruler who holds the threads of fate of all those present tightly in his grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位黑暗灵族半张脸隐藏在金色的面具后面，面具上的面孔令人望而生畏，另外半张脸则露出了充满恶意的微笑，露着尖牙。精心制作的盔甲上，装饰着无数头骨，以及被利刃与钩子刺穿的人皮碎片。他的举止充满了权威与轻松，仿佛他是这里的统治者，而在场所有人的命运之线都紧紧握在他的手中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}顔の半分はいかめしい顔つきの黄金の仮面に隠されていて、もう半分は凶悪な鋭い歯があらわになっている。異種族が着用している精巧な防具は、無数の刃や鉤に突き刺さった頭蓋骨や人間の皮膚の切れ端で飾られている。自分の手の内にあるすべての者の運命を掌握している支配者のような権威をにじませながら、堂々と振舞っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One half of his face is hidden behind a golden mask with an intimidating visage, the other half is showing a malicious, sharp-toothed leer. The xenos's elaborate armour is decorated with skulls and patches of human skin impaled on countless blades and hooks. He carries himself with authority and ease, as though he is a ruler who holds the threads of fate of all those present tightly in his grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}顔の半分はいかめしい顔つきの黄金の仮面に隠されていて、もう半分は凶悪な鋭い歯があらわになっている。異種族が着用している精巧な防具は、無数の刃や鉤に突き刺さった頭蓋骨や人間の皮膚の切れ端で飾られている。自分の手の内にあるすべての者の運命を掌握している支配者のような権威をにじませながら、堂々と振舞っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mitad de su rostro está oculta tras una máscara dorada de aspecto intimidante, mientras que la otra muestra una mirada lasciva y maliciosa. La armadura elaborada del xenos está decorada con cráneos y retazos de piel humana atravesada por incontables cuchillas y ganchos. Se yergue con autoridad y comodidad, como si tuviera en sus manos el destino de todos los presentes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One half of his face is hidden behind a golden mask with an intimidating visage, the other half is showing a malicious, sharp-toothed leer. The xenos's elaborate armour is decorated with skulls and patches of human skin impaled on countless blades and hooks. He carries himself with authority and ease, as though he is a ruler who holds the threads of fate of all those present tightly in his grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mitad de su rostro está oculta tras una máscara dorada de aspecto intimidante, mientras que la otra muestra una mirada lasciva y maliciosa. La armadura elaborada del xenos está decorada con cráneos y retazos de piel humana atravesada por incontables cuchillas y ganchos. Se yergue con autoridad y comodidad, como si tuviera en sus manos el destino de todos los presentes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La moitié de son visage est recouverte d'un masque doré intimidant, et son unique œil visible vous dévisage d'un air hostile. L'armure élaborée du xénos est ornée de crânes et de lambeaux de peau humaine embrochés sur d'innombrables crochets. À sa posture impérieuse, on pourrait croire que le destin de tous ceux qui se tiennent dans cette pièce repose entre ses mains.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One half of his face is hidden behind a golden mask with an intimidating visage, the other half is showing a malicious, sharp-toothed leer. The xenos's elaborate armour is decorated with skulls and patches of human skin impaled on countless blades and hooks. He carries himself with authority and ease, as though he is a ruler who holds the threads of fate of all those present tightly in his grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La moitié de son visage est recouverte d'un masque doré intimidant, et son unique œil visible vous dévisage d'un air hostile. L'armure élaborée du xénos est ornée de crânes et de lambeaux de peau humaine embrochés sur d'innombrables crochets. À sa posture impérieuse, on pourrait croire que le destin de tous ceux qui se tiennent dans cette pièce repose entre ses mains.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Hälfte seines Gesichts ist hinter einer Goldmaske mit einer einschüchternden Fratze verborgen, die andere zeigt ein bösartiges, spitzzahniges Grinsen. Die ausladende Rüstung des Xenos ist mit Schädeln und Menschenhautfetzen verziert, die auf unzählige Klingen und Haken gespießt wurden. Sein Auftreten ist autoritär und entspannt – ein Herrscher, der die Schicksalsfäden aller Anwesenden fest im Griff hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One half of his face is hidden behind a golden mask with an intimidating visage, the other half is showing a malicious, sharp-toothed leer. He carries himself with authority and ease, as though he is a ruler who holds the threads of fate of all those present tightly in his grasp.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüzünün bir yarısı, tehditkârlık aşılayan altın bir maskenin arkasına gizlenmiş; diğer yarısı ise kötücül, dişlerini geçirmeye hazır bir bakış sergiliyor. Zenonun detaylı zırhı, kafataslarıyla ve sayısız bıçağa, kancaya takılmış insan derisi parçalarıyla dekore edilmiş. Otoriter ve rahat bir tavrı var. Orada bulunan herkesin kaderini elinde sımsıkı tutan bir hükümdar edasına sahip.{/n}

The xenos's elaborate armour is decorated with skulls and patches of human skin impaled on countless blades and hooks. He carries himself with authority and ease, as though he is a ruler who holds the threads of fate of all those present tightly in his grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzünün bir yarısı, tehditkâr bir görünüme sahip altın bir maskenin arkasına gizlenmiş, diğer yarısı ise kötücül, dişlerini geçirmeye hazır bir bakış sergiliyor. Zenonun detaylı zırhı, kafataslarıyla ve sayısız bıçağa ve kancaya takılmış insan derisi parçalarıyla dekore edilmiş. Otoriter ve rahat bir tavrı var. Orada bulunan herkesin kaderini elinde sımsıkı tutan bir hükümdar edasına sahip.{/n}
